## Load Packages

```{r}

if(!require(librarian)){
  install.packages(librarian)
  library(librarian)
}

shelf(tidyverse, here, DBI, RPostgres, janitor, readxl, parsedate)

```

# slow method for reading csv files
```{r}
filenames <- gsub("\\.xlsx$","", list.files(here("raw_data")))

for(i in filenames){
  assign(i, read_xlsx(here("raw_data", paste(i, ".xlsx", sep="")), skip = 1, progress = readxl_progress()))
}
```
